text: M. Siddique(1928- February 4, 2013) () was a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chittagong-14. ==Life and Career== He was born on 1928 in Chittagong district under Satkania Upazila. In 17 December 1970, he elected as MPA at Provincial Assembly election from Chittagong-14 (P.E-294) and also he was elected to parliament from Chittagong-14 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. He died on February 4, 2013 at Satkania Upazila of his own residence. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Awami League politicians Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:People from Chittagong District
title: M. Siddique
